features: 🔥[Mini & Easy to carry] yeilebe portable projector are designed with new upgraded technology, this mini projectors comparable to the size of a smartphone, bringing the cinema experience anywhere(Support Power Bank Supply), while still being mini enough to fit in your backpack ( 5.79"*3.98"*2.28"/0.75 lb ).

🔥[Brilliant Home Theater Experience] Supports 1080P Full HD; this mini projector brings you breathtaking picture quality and remarkable clarity with up to 1080p resolution. Also, yeilebe mini portable projector uses an efficient heat dissipation system, which dramatically reduces fan noise, with a built-in HIFI speaker, it provides excellent sound quality. Relax with larger-than-life entertainment with the LED mini projector from yeilebe.

🔥【Multimedia function】 Yeilebe home movie projector is equipped with multiple ports, such as HDMI/Earphones/ USB interface, which can be easily connected to a variety of media devices, compatible with Laptop, PCs, TV Box, TV Stick, Chrome Book, Tablets, USB Flash Drive, Media players, Smartphones. ( Note: Due to HDCP copyright, this mini projectors doesn't support Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu, but you could use Amazon Fire Stick or Roku Stick.)

🔥【Protect Kids' Eyesight】The Light intensity of yeilebe mini projector is relatively weak, which is softer to the eyes. It can play videos, photos, and presentations, stream movies, sports, games, and more, a good way to avoid the direct view of the light source such as phones and iPad, effectively reducing the damage to the child's vision.

🔥【What in the box】 Includes yeilebe mini projector*1/remote control(batteries not included)*1/power adapter*1/HDMI cable*1/user manual*1. Machine description: 800x480p resolution; supports up to 1080p projection display size up to 170",16:9 aspect ratio,1,000 lumens LED projection lamp.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: In a world where technology connections us, the products getting simplers and portable such as TV, computer, phone, etc... Our brand starts with the pursuit of beautiful moments, we believe that everyone aspires to create unique and unforgettable experiences in family, work, and entertainment. So, we decided to build a mini projector based on innovation and technology that can bring unlimited imagination and fun to people!

VF290 Mini Projector Specifications： ✔Resolution: Native 800 x 480P, 1080P support ✔Brightness: 1000Lumens ✔Aspect Ratio: 16:9 ✔Projection Size: 22''-170'' ✔Power input:DC 12V-2.5A/ Micro USB>5V-2A ✔Video input: HDMI/ USB ✔Speak: 4Ω 2w ✔Unite size:5.79''*3.98''*2.28'' ✔Net Weight:0.75 lbs
Yeilebe mini projector can be connected with Phone/Tablet/PC/TV-BOX/Fire TV Stick/ROKU/Extra sepaker etc...

Warm tips: For the best projection effect please play in a dark place with a projector screen.For iPhone/ iPad Connection: Recommend to use Apple’s original lightning. Otherwise, require extra Lightning to HDMI Adapter.For Android Connection: Need additional Micro USB/USB-C to HDMI. (Please refer to the interface type selection of your device.)PC/TV BOX/Fire TV Stick/ROKU: Use HDMI Interface. (HDMI cable Included)What if no sound when playing the Netflix video? Pls, turn off Dolby Surround Sound on the connected device.Due to copyright restrictions, Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video, and Hulu movies can only be watched on a connected laptop, Chromecast, wifi stick, TV stick, or Roku.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient good picture
reviews.reviewText: I compared with lots of other projectors, comparing the specs, features and price.Bottom line, this is a great little projector at a good price. Don't overthink it. Easily portable, good size, and just more simple to setup & use than the four year old model we replaced.We used the power adapter instead of powering it from the USB plug, and it was plenty bright, crisp picture, easy to setup. Kids loved outdoor movie night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars compact, fun, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Here is a small first time how-to:1. To turn on, you must press the power button for a few seconds2. After choosing language, you select the input of your video3. HDMI cord is included, so I tested it out with my laptop right away - turned on without any problems, no additional set up was needed.4. After connecting laptop or phone, you set up the projector where you want it and adjust the focus with an adjuster handle5. To make sure the projection is straight and not crooked, the projector must be completely parallel to the wall and preferably at a straight angle - not tiled. It will still show a decent image if tilted, but you will get the best picture if it is set up straight6. The sound will play directly from the projector as a default - but you can change that in your laptop settings to use your laptop speakers if you want.It does not run on battery - you must use the supply cord, which is not too long, so you will need to be close to an outlet. It does make noise when on, but if you turn on video you will not be able to hear it anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and powerful
reviews.reviewText: Easy to understand the settings. The picture resolution is perfect and it’s adjustable so you can fit it perfectly against your wall/canvas/screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Powerful Mini Projector
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This mini projector is the perfect size to take along for travel, a movie night in the living room, a campsite or the backyard. You can project onto a blank white wall or white sheet and even onto the ceiling.I like bright colorful compact design. It stows away easily after use. You can use the HDMI to connect your laptop, phone, Amazon Fire stick, Apple TV and much more.The picture quality is clear and crisp and remains clear even when increasing the display size.The sound quality is good, loud and clear. I did not even need to use a Bluetooth Speaker for better sound. I enjoyed the Surround Stereo Sound option that makes you feel like you are in a movie theater.There is a low fan sound from the projector running, however it is not a nuisance.The projector has quick response time, warm, cool and cinema movie picture quality options. You can also share images and audio from another device.All in good, it is a good solid product at a budget friendly price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent quality and portable
reviews.reviewText: Easy to understand the settings and use. Has good quality and very portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I like this projector a lot, my job is traveling around the country and I have little space and many times I stay in places where there is no TV and I have to use the tablet, but now I tried this projector and I am really delighted, I like that it does not take up any space almost space, it makes no noise and is simple to use, I can see the photos and videos and you can watch Netflix from the iPhone, you only need a good iPhone to HDMI adapter. In short, it is a good purchase for its price, I think I achieved a screen of approximately 55” I leave you photos. The remote controller is a really good thing, the picture quality are nice, remember is 1080P max, but is a portable proyector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good portable movie theater 👍
reviews.reviewText: This projector surprised me. Quite a decent product for the money. On a flat white background the picture is clear and bright. The speaker also works great, quite loud, without sound distortion, not perfect ofcourse, but still good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great with HDMI and MP4 files. Hit and miss with other formats
reviews.reviewText: This little projector will be great for anyone wanting to show movies or presentation slides through an HDMI connection to a computer. It connected perfectly with my Windows laptop and performed just as I hoped.When I tried the projector with various video files on a USB stick, it recognized both MP4 and MKV files, but it would only play the MP4 files; it threw an error with the MKV file playback. The MKV files worked fine on my computer and on another computer I transferred them to for testing. (That knocked it down from five stars to four.)The projector works as expected with its included power adapter. It can also accept power through a micro USB port (the kind used on older cell phones and bluetooth speakers). I successfully powered it that way using a portable power bank.The brightness and contrast are good if you use it in a very dark room. If the projector has to overcome even low levels of ambient light, you notice the drop in picture quality right away. Given its very inexpensive price point, I can't expect anything more from it.The box includes the projector, plug-in power supply, HDMI cable, remote (uses 2 AAA batteries, not included), and a an instruction guide that is most useful for telling you which button does what on the projector.Recommended for outdoor nighttime or indoor basement movies. Still a good value if that's what you need.
